allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Top 5 Priority Features

1. Password Reset Email
   - Added Dutch email template with reset link
   - Integrated email sending in forgot-password API
   - Added audit logging for email events

2. Premium Feature Gating
   - Created subscription.ts with plan features \(basic/premium/gold\)
   - Swipe API now enforces daily limits \(25 swipes, 1 superlike for basic\)
   - Premium users get unlimited swipes, Gold gets everything unlimited

3. Super Like Distinction
   - Added isSuperLike field to Prisma schema
   - Swipe API accepts isSuperLike parameter
   - Super Like notification sent to recipient
   - Updated types \(SwipeAction, SwipeLimits\)

4. Voice Intro on Discover Cards
   - Added mic button to DiscoverCard for voice intro playback
   - Voice intro also playable in bio modal
   - Created AudioRecorder component and useAudioRecorder hook
   - Added voice message support in chat

5. Read Receipts
   - Created /api/messages/read endpoint
   - Chat UI shows checkmarks \(âœ“ sent, âœ“âœ“ read in blue\)
   - Premium gating for read receipts visibility

Additional changes:
- Translated entire UI to Dutch
- Improved registration flow \(removed photo step\)
- Added onboarding modal for photo upload

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(FIXED_AMOUNT"
- Inconsistentie tussen CREATE \(POST\) en UPDATE \(PATCH\) endpoints

Oplossing:
- POST route aangepast om zelfde veldnamen te gebruiken als PATCH
- Beide endpoints nu consistent: type, value, maxTotalUses, validUntil
- Betere validatie en error messages toegevoegd
- Zod schema dependency verwijderd voor meer flexibiliteit

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
